items.name: LE UV Flashlight (Handheld Black Light)
items.how_we_use: We use this to spot-check UV resin cures and for quick UV curing jobs.

items.name: LE UV Flashlight (handheld black light)
items.how_we_use: We use this to spot-check UV resin curing and to see fluorescent dust/marks during cleanup.

items.name: LED UV Lamp 54W Resin Curing Light
items.how_we_use: We use this larger lamp for curing bigger resin pieces and molds.

items.name: LET'S RESIN Resin Heating Mat
items.how_we_use: We use this to gently warm resin bottles/cups to thin the resin, help bubbles rise, and improve pours in cooler weather.

items.name: LET'S RESIN Two-Sided UV Resin Lamp (36 LEDs)
items.how_we_use: We use this to cure UV resin and small resin projects more evenly (top and bottom light helps reduce tacky spots).

items.name: LET'S RESIN UV Lamp (Two-Sided, 36 LEDs)
items.how_we_use: We use this to cure UV resin on both sides without flipping pieces.

items.name: LETSRESIN Resin Heating Mat
items.how_we_use: We use this to warm resin for fewer bubbles and smoother pours.

items.name: Air Fed System Chemical Mask
items.how_we_use: We use this for respiratory protection during dusty, smoky, or fume-heavy jobs.

items.name: Alexa Air Quality Monitor
items.how_we_use: We use this to monitor air quality so we know when to ventilate during dusty or fume-heavy work.

items.name: Amazon Smart Air Quality Monitor
items.how_we_use: We use this to monitor air quality so we know when to ventilate during dusty or fume-heavy work.

items.name: Anti Fog Goggles
items.how_we_use: We use these for eye protection when cutting, grinding, or working with splashes.

items.name: Anti Fog Safety Goggles,Lighting Protective Laser Glasses Safety Light Protection Goggles OD 5 200 nm 2000 nm
items.how_we_use: We use these for eye protection when cutting, grinding, or working with splashes.

items.name: Bluetooth Beanie Hat with LED Light + Headphones

items.name: Dräger X-plore 3500 Half-Face Respirator
